game.name: MiSide
game.shortDescription: 한 캐릭터와 수시로 교류하는 게임이 있다고 상상해 보세요. 그리고 어느 날 그 게임 속으로 직접 들어가게 된다면?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Let's imagine that you have a game in which you care for a character. But could you imagine one day getting into that game yourself?

reviewHighlights.text: Amazing psychological horror game, speaking to a women was truly terrifying
Buying this ideal product of the gaming industry, I can safely say that this game is not scary like DDLC and other similar products. I like this game...
